transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello ji Kishan steel se baat kar rahe hain Salim ji.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Salim ji good morning main Shubham baat kar raha hun sir India Mart head office se kaise hain aap?
Customer: Aapka post kya hai? Aapka post kya hai?
Executive: Sir Avnish ka manager baat kar raha hun sir.
Customer: Achcha. Haan ji jo aapke account manager hain.
Executive: Kya bol kya bol rahe ho sir?
Customer: Sir koi Naveen ji baat kar raha hai, koi Hari ji baat kar raha hai, koi aur baat kar raha hai.
Executive: Sir aawaz kam aa rahi hai. Hello.
Customer: Matlab bahut sare baat kar rahe hain. To Avnish ji ke upar kitne hain? 10, 20, 25 kitne ho?
Executive: Avnish ke upar sir?
Customer: Haan. Main bata deta hun na sir aapko. Avnish ki direct reporting mere ko hai. Meri reporting mere manager ko hai. To ek tarike se aap aap se jo last discussion hua tha wo kiska hua tha?
Executive: Direct seedha direct seedha owner ko bata do ki ye problem aa raha hai. To seedha wo wo wo usko jyada fikar hogi.
Customer: Sir aapki baat theek hai bilkul Salim ji. Aapse jo discussion hua tha wo Naveen sir ka hua tha. Naveen sir mere bhi manager hain wo hamare business head hain. Aapse video meeting ke liye call sir sun to lijiye meri puri baat. Ek minute main video meeting ke liye call kiya hai aap agar ek video meeting arrange kar lenge to main apne sare managers ko bhi usme rakhunga. To shayad hum aapki buyleads wali problem pe jyada discussion kar payenge. Main isliye bol gaya.
Executive: Mera mera matlab mere ko dekhne se aapka sab kaam ho jayega. Mujhe dekhne se kaam ho jayega?
Customer: Sir dekhne se nahi hota. Hume aapko dekhna important nahi hai. Hum sir main batata hun video meeting mein kis liye bol raha hun. Salim ji main isliye bol raha hun kyunki main screen share karke aapki problem samajh paunga sir. Dekhna important nahi hai. Aap camera off kar lijiyega. Hum camera on kar lenge sir.
Executive: Aap aap WhatsApp pe agar hai group mein to aap baat kar lo Avinash ji se. WhatsApp mein group mein aa jao. Maine usme sab dala hua hai. Aap dekh lena waha se.
Customer: Sir mujhe.
Executive: Sir aapki baat bilkul sahi hai. Sir.
Customer: Sir sawal dekh lo.
Executive: Sir aapne dala hua hai bilkul dala hua hai lekin main sir agar kuch buyleads ke liye aapse.
Customer: To phir kya usme dekhna hai? To kya matlab kuch jadu hoga aapke waha se?
Executive: Are yaar kya baat kar rahe ho jo technical aapke waha se hone wala kaam hai. Mere yaha se kaise karenge aap? Wo aap batao.
Customer: Sir samajh gaya main. Mera aisa to nahi hai ki main yaha se koi command dunga aur aap mujhe bolenge ki ye command do to ye ho jayega.
Executive: Sir command wali baat hi nahi hai sir Salim ji.
Customer: To phir aap aap waha se karna hai bhai to kar lo na. Maine maine ek message bhi diya hai ki catalog ko sahi karo, grouping sahi karo.
Executive: Sir main batata hun main aapse kyun discussion karna chah raha hun aap suniye. Main aapse isliye.
Customer: Mere paas time hai na aap free baithe ho. Main kaam mein hun. Hai na? Aap baat karo. Aap time batao. Aap ek hafte ke baad karo.
Executive: Sir to aap Salim bhai aap time bata dijiye.
Customer: Ek hafte ke baad?
Executive: Haan. Kyunki aap aap bhi free ho isliye aapke paas koi kaam nahi hai.
Customer: Sir sir aap shaam ka time de dijiye. Ek hafte tak to sir main aapke baad bhi karo kyunki aap aapko kaam nahi karna hai.
Executive: Sir kaam karna hai mere ko. Mere paas bahut kaam hai.
Customer: Sir kaam karne ki to karo na bhai. Kyun pareshan kar rahe ho?
Executive: Sir main kuch categories ka discussion chahta hun sir aapse aap kar lenge.
Customer: Aap aap wo Avinash ji se sab discuss ho chuka hai aap unse baat karo.
Executive: Are sir main kuch category aapse suggestion leke add karwana chah raha hun aapke catalog mein.
Customer: Koi bhi add nahi karna hai jo hai uska pehle solution nikalo.
Executive: Sir kuch aapko add nahi karne ki zarurat nahi hai aapke paas jo hai uska.
Customer: Sir jo hai uska aap looking aur grouping jo bhi hai wo karo. Se hoga. Wese bhi time nikal raha hai. 6 mahina to teen char logo ne mujhe nikal diya hai. 6 mahina to teen char logo ne.
Executive: Sir samajh gaya. Achcha aap.
Customer: Main ye nikalunga sir. Nahi nikalunga. Ek minute meri baat suniye. Aap ek minute bolne wali baat hai. Aise hi karte.
Executive: Are sir meri baat to sun lijiye ek minute.
Customer: Sab aise hi karte.
Executive: Main keh raha hun sir MS plate mein aap for example deal karte ho. Ab MS plate se related category jaise MS checkered plate hai. Theek hai hot rolled plates hai. Aapki Aser plate hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Multiple executives are contacting him.

- Wants resolution for buyleads issue.

- Wants catalog and grouping to be corrected.



Resolution:

- Executive explained his role as Avnish's manager.

- Executive suggested a video meeting to discuss buyleads.

- Executive wanted to discuss categories for catalog.



Next Steps: 

- Customer asked to call after a week.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Annoyed



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, catalog, categories, video meeting
